official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to revise the boundary of the Minute Man National Historical Park in the State of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Amends the Federal law to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to revise the boundary of the Minute Man National Historical Park in Massachusetts.
